colorTheory.description: This palette combines classic text colors with a modern accent, creating a balance of professionalism and creativity.
colorTheory.mood: The colors evoke a sense of sophistication and modernity while maintaining readability.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures good readability, meeting WCAG AA compliance.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary and secondary colors create a harmonious base, while the accent color adds a pop of freshness. The success, warning, error, and info colors provide clear distinctions for different states.
